data.description: <p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span><span style="font-family:Verdana, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>There are over 7 billion people on this planet. And by 2050, there will be 2 billion more... many moving into urban centers at an unprecedented rate. Making sure there is enough food, fiber and infrastructure for our rapidly growing world is what we're all about at John Deere. And it's why we're investing in our people and our technology like never before! Here the world's brightest minds are tackling the world's biggest challenges. If you believe one person can make the world a better place, we'll put you to work. RIGHT NOW.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:10.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><em><span>John Deere is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to, among other things, race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with disability.</span></em></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><b><span>Primary Location:</span></b><span> United States (US)</span><span> - Iowa</span><span> - Ames</span><span> <br><b>Function:</b> Technology (CA)</span><br><span><b>Title: </b>Part-Time Student Channel UX Software Engineer-Ames IA</span><span> - 116192</span> <br><b><span>Onsite/Remote:</span></b><span>Onsite Position</span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><b>Note: Relocation assistance is not provided.</b></span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><em>The Part-Time Student Program is primarily designed to augment the Company’s regular full-time staff and is for students who work in parallel to their school schedule <b>YEAR-ROUND</b>.</em></span></span></p><div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'>Your Responsibilities</H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><p style="margin: 0in; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">As a <strong>Part-Time Student - Channel UX Software Engineer </strong>for <strong>John Deere Tech Works</strong> located in <span style="font-weight: bold;">Ames, IA</span><strong>:</strong></span></p><p style="margin: 0in; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 12.0pt;"> </p><ul><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">You will be part of a team of students working for John Deere’s Order Management building scalable applications residing on AWS Cloud architecture for both web based and mobile applications. </span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">In this role you will design, create and implement innovative applications. </span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">You will have an opportunity to improve your engineering skills with TDD, CI/CD, Git, Java, React, Node.js and other languages through developing applications. </span></li></ul><p style="margin: 0in; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 12.0pt;"> </p><p style="margin: 0in; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">This position is NOT available to students on immigration visas</span></p><p style="margin: 0in; font-family: Calibri; font-size: 12.0pt;"> </p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'>What Skills You Need</H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><ul><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Ideally, you will be pursuing a degree in Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Management Information Systems</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Exposure to one or more programming languages: Java, NodeJS, Python or scripting like Perl</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Demonstrated ability to rapidly learn new technologies</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Strong analytical, communication and intrapersonal skills</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">10 - 20 hours/week during the academic year</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">35 - 40 hours/week during the summer semesters and school breaks </span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Must be registered as a full-time student at a high education institution<br /></span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Must be able to commute to work at the ISU Research Park (on the bus route)<br /></span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Graduation date of Spring 2027 or later<br /></span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Cumulative GPA of 2.8 or above </span></li></ul><p> </p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'>What Makes You Stand Out</H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><ul><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Exposure to continuous integration and continuous deployment concepts</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Exposure to TDD practices</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Background in networking, infrastructure, general cloud exposure, and experience with security concepts</span></li><li style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Exposure to cloud concepts and AWS/Azure services </span></li></ul><p> </p></div></div></div><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>At John Deere, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. Here, you'll enjoy the freedom to explore new projects, the support to think outside the box and the advanced tools and technology that foster innovation and achievement. Additionally, we offer a comprehensive reward package to help you get started on your new career path, including:</span></span></span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Flexible work arrangements</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Highly competitive base pay and performance bonuses</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Savings &amp; Retirement benefits (401K and Defined Benefit Pension)</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Healthcare benefits with a generous company contribution in the Health Savings Account</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Adoption assistance</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Employee Assistance Programs</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Tuition assistance</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Fitness subsidies and on-site gyms at specific Deere locations</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Charitable contribution match</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Employee Purchase Plan &amp; numerous discount programs for personal use</span></span></span></li></ul><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px">$15 - $40 hourly based on published rates for business function and education level.</p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Follow this link to learn more about our Total Rewards Package <a href="https://bit.ly/3XCd8fL"><span style="color:blue">https://bit.ly/3XCd8fL</span></a> </span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px">Must be 18 years of age or older to apply</p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt"><span>The information contained herein is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities and qualifications required of individuals performing the job. The qualifications detailed in this job description are not considered the minimum requirements necessary to perform the job, but rather as guidelines.</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt"><span>The terms of the applicable benefit plans, and all company actions administering or interpreting these plans, continue to control. Deere &amp; Company reserves the right to suspend, amend, modify, or terminate the Plan(s) in any manner at any time, including the right to modify or eliminate any cost-sharing between the company and participants. Changes, which can be made at any time, are made by action of the company's board of directors, or to the extent authorized by resolution of its board of directors, or by the Deere &amp; Company Compensation Committee. In the event of a conflict between the language of the official Plan Documents and this document, the language of the official Plan Documents will control.</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt"><span>ACA Section 1557 Nondiscrimination Notice</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:9.0px"><span style="font-family:Aptos, sans-serif"><em>The John Deere Health Benefit Plans for Salaried Employees and The John Deere Benefit Plan for Wage Employees comply with applicable Federal civil rights laws and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with disability.</em></span></span></p>
